metadata.name: AMARA
metadata.description:
My little sister affectionately gave this a name, and it symbolizes the remarkable woman I view her as - a driven, compassionate, and considerate individual who always places the needs and joy of others before their own. Every time I look at her, I can't help but beam. The delight she radiates and the way her presence illuminates an area. I'm preserving a bit of her in this, and I'm now giving it to you.  
Lots of love, BumbleBee
